item.title: Fri, 07 Apr
item.description:
The Big Bang Theory - The Recollection Dissipation (s10e20)


Supernatural - The British Invasion (s12e17)


The Last Kingdom - Episode 4 (s02e04)

episode.name: The Recollection Dissipation
episode.summary: Sheldon pushes himself to the limit when he collaborates on projects with Leonard and Wolowitz as well as Amy on the same day. Also, Bernadette is nearing the end of her maternity leave and must return to work.

episode.name: The British Invasion
episode.summary: Sam and Dean get a lead on Kelly Kline’s whereabouts. Mick drops by the bunker unexpectedly and decides to join the hunt.

episode.name: Episode 4
episode.summary: Guthred’s lack of judgement has divided Northumbria. Having sworn his allegiance to Alfred once again, Uhtred must travel North to defeat the brothers Erik and Sigefrid, take back Eoferwic and reassert Guthred’s authority. Alfred spots an opportunity to remind Guthred of his duty to Wessex and sends Aethelwold to join Uhred’s riding party. But with the responsibility of ensuring Eoferwic’s future as a Christian region thrust upon him, Aethelwold’s judgement becomes clouded. Joining Brida and Ragnar’s men in Loidis, Uhtred and the others discuss a plan of attack and turn their attention to Dunholm. Ragnar is intent on avenging Kjartan: can Uhtred come to his aid without defying Alfred? Meanwhile, a confrontation with the Northmen brings a shocking turn of events and elsewhere, hostility is rife when Sven attempts to reason with Thyra. But will she want to hear what her captive has to say?

item.title: Thu, 06 Apr
item.description:
Modern Family - Frank's Wedding (s08e19)


The Expanse - Here There Be Dragons (s02e11)


Blindspot - Senile Lines (s02e18)

episode.name: Frank's Wedding
episode.summary: Frank Dunphy's wedding has a Roaring '20s theme, so Phil gets his clan to show up in costume, but Claire and the kids realize it's time for an intervention with Phil when they're the only ones who dressed up. Jay comes to regret mastering the art of saying "no". Cam finally gets the courage to stand up to his sister Pam.

episode.name: Here There Be Dragons
episode.summary: Bobbie makes a decision that changes her life forever.

episode.name: Senile Lines
episode.summary: Under investigation by an old rival, the team struggles to defend itself. Meanwhile, a tattoo leads them to a mysterious death at a foster home.

item.title: Wed, 05 Apr
item.description: The Americans (2013) - Lotus 1-2-3 (s05e05)

episode.name: Lotus 1-2-3
episode.summary: Philip and Elizabeth receive surprising news about Henry -- and shattering news about a past operation. Stan might be falling in love, but Philip wonders if something darker is going on.

item.title: Tue, 04 Apr
item.description: Quantico - MKTOPAZ (s02e16)

episode.name: MKTOPAZ
episode.summary: When Clay is forced to use his fiancée to carry out an operation, the whole team reexamines their personal connections, or more accurately, the lack thereof. Meanwhile, Alex forges an unexpected bond with an asset at the center of a conspiracy, and Harry struggles to find his place on the task force.

item.title: Mon, 03 Apr
item.description:
The Walking Dead - The First Day of the Rest of Your Life (s07e16)


Homeland - R for Romeo (s06e11)


Black Sails - XXXVIII (s04e10)


Billions - Victory Lap (s02e07)


Into the Badlands - Red Sun, Silver Moon (s02e03)

episode.name: The First Day of the Rest of Your Life
episode.summary: In the season finale, the stakes keep mounting higher and higher as different stories from the season clash while the group enacts an intricate plan.

episode.name: R for Romeo
episode.summary: Carrie and Quinn make a discovery while Keane makes a decision and Max finds trouble.

episode.name: XXXVIII
episode.summary: Flint makes a final push to topple England. Silver seals his fate. Rackham confronts Rogers. Nassau is changed forever.

episode.name: Victory Lap
episode.summary: Axe assembles a war room in the Hamptons following a disastrous setback in Sandicot for Axe Capital. The fate of the town hangs in the balance while Axe seeks counsel on how to best recoup his losses. Meanwhile, Chuck capitalizes on a high-profile victory, but alienates Wendy in the process, causing the couple to change the status of their separation.

episode.name: Red Sun, Silver Moon
episode.summary: Sunny and Bajie meet a dangerous foe who knows Sunny; the Widow prepares for a showdown; MK learns a secret.

item.title: Fri, 31 Mar
item.description:
The Big Bang Theory - The Collaboration Fluctuation (s10e19)


Supernatural - Ladies Drink Free (s12e16)


The Last Kingdom - Episode 3 (s02e03)

episode.name: The Collaboration Fluctuation
episode.summary: Leonard, Penny and Raj adjust to their new living arrangement and Sheldon takes an interest in Amy's work.

episode.name: Ladies Drink Free
episode.summary: Sam and Dean let Mick Davies tag along on a case as they search for a werewolf. The three men run into Claire Novak, also working the hunt. However, the reunion is short lived after Claire is bitten and the brothers race to find a way to help her before she turns.

episode.name: Episode 3
episode.summary: Betrayed by Guthred and condemned to a life of slavery, Uhtred and Halig, along with fellow slave Finan, are forced to row endlessly on a trader ship. Meanwhile, in order to gain their allegiance, Guthred welcomes Aelfric and the savage Dane brothers Erik and Sigefrid into Eoferwic,- a reward for dispatching Uhtred. But when a dispute in the terms threatens to jeopardise the agreement, Guthred offers Gisela as a peace offering. but will she comply? Having been released from imprisonment by Alfred, Ragnar and Brida are given instruction to rescue Uhtred. Accompanied by Saxon warrior Steapa, Ragnar and Hild set off in search of the slave ship. But, with the conditions at sea worsening, will they be able to find Uhtred and Halig in time? As Ragnar travels north to confront the men who sold Uhtred into slavery, he discovers that Guthred is steadily losing control of his power. Erik and Sigefrid have failed to defeat Kjartan and are still at large in the north setting up a stronghold at York once more. Meanwhile in Wessex, Alfred seeks to further his influence over Mercia by arranging a marriage for his daughter Aethelflaed.

item.title: Thu, 30 Mar
item.description:
Modern Family - Five Minutes (s08e18)


Arrow - Disbanded (s05e18)


The 100 - God Complex (s04e08)


The Expanse - Cascade (s02e10)


Blindspot - Solos (s02e17)

episode.name: Five Minutes
episode.summary: Mitch and Cam have five minutes to catch a new flight while fighting the effects of sleeping pills they took prematurely. Then at Rainer’s birthday dinner, Haley and Rainer are forced to reevaluate their entire relationship in the five minutes before the birthday cake arrives. Phil and Claire pay a surprise visit to Alex and are given a five-minute surprise introduction to her new boyfriend. With only five minutes to catch a movie, Manny has to find the perfect parking space and endure Jay and Gloria’s backseat argument.

episode.name: Disbanded
episode.summary: Diggle and Felicity are shocked by Oliver’s decision to call on the Bratva to help take down Prometheus. Concerned the Bratva may overstep, Diggle has a hard conversation with Oliver about what happens if things go south. Meanwhile, Felicity learns something shocking at Helix.

episode.name: God Complex
episode.summary: After a disappointing discovery, Clarke and Abby question how far they're willing to go. Meanwhile, Jaha finds a lead to the mysterious Second Dawn.

episode.name: Cascade
episode.summary: Holden leads his crew through the war-torn station on Ganymede. Meanwhile Bobbie makes a decision that changes her life forever.

episode.name: Solos
episode.summary: Jane and her new flame Oliver find themselves in a dangerous situation that exposes the secrets they've both been keeping. Uncertain if they can trust each other, the couple must stay alive while Weller and the team race to save them.

item.title: Wed, 29 Mar
item.description:
Bones - The End in the End (s12e12)


The Americans (2013) - What's the Matter with Kansas? (s05e04)

episode.name: The End in the End
episode.summary: With Kovac still at large, the team searches for evidence to track him down. After Brennan experiences a setback, the rest of the team must figure out how to find Kovac without her, putting everything she has ever taught them to the test. When all signs point to Kovac having outside help, as well as a hideout, Booth and Brennan go searching for him.

episode.name: What's the Matter with Kansas?
episode.summary: Philip and Elizabeth have qualms about a new assignment, while a specter from Philip’s past creates unforeseen dangers. At the FBI, Stan makes a shocking play that could throw his career into turmoil.

item.title: Tue, 28 Mar
item.description: Quantico - MOCKINGBIRD (s02e15)

episode.name: MOCKINGBIRD
episode.summary: While their newly appointed leader gets familiar with the team of CIA and FBI agents, Owen leads an investigation into the strange world of fake news. But hunting down the publishers of a fake story might lead to deadly consequences.

item.title: Mon, 27 Mar
item.description:
The Walking Dead - Something They Need (s07e15)


Homeland - The Flag House (s06e10)


Black Sails - XXXVII (s04e09)


Billions - Indian Four (s02e06)


Into the Badlands - Force of Eagle's Claw (s02e02)

episode.name: Something They Need
episode.summary: A group of Alexandrians embarks on a journey to a distant community and one member of the group must make a heartbreaking decision.

episode.name: The Flag House
episode.summary: Dar plays his hand. Quinn revisits his past.

episode.name: XXXVII
episode.summary: Silver and his men hunt for Flint on Skeleton Island. Madi receives an offer. Billy casts his lot.

episode.name: Indian Four
episode.summary: Axe negotiates with a timid seller. Chuck's deal with a defendant fails.

episode.name: Force of Eagle's Claw
episode.summary: Sunny and Bajie struggle to stay alive; the Widow consolidates her power in the face of challenges.

item.title: Fri, 24 Mar
item.description: The Last Kingdom - Episode 2 (s02e02)

episode.name: Episode 2
episode.summary: When spies infiltrate the Cumbraland army, Uhtred must rely on his troops to protect him from a perilous attack. Spurred on by the recent rogue ambush, Guthred makes a decision to march on Eoferwic. However, Abbot Eadred’s disapproval of Uhtred grows to dangerous heights and his influence over the Dane King threatens the alliance between Guthred and Uhtred. Finding himself face to face with ruthless brothers Erik and Sigefrid, will Guthred’s efforts to emulate Alfred’s conciliatory tactics backfire? Meanwhile, Hild goes on a journey of self-discovery as she considers exchanging her life as a nun for that of a warrior. Seeking to prove herself to Uhtred’s men, she sets about a gruesome task. Elsewhere, Kjartan’s thirst for revenge grows stronger, as Uhtred rides as the dead horseman once again. When affection between Uhtred and Gisela reaches new heights, Uhtred’s enemies close in and he suffers a grave betrayal.

item.title: Thu, 23 Mar
item.description:
Arrow - Kapiushon (s05e17)


The 100 - Gimme Shelter (s04e07)


The Expanse - The Weeping Somnambulist (s02e09)


Blindspot - Evil Did I Dwell, Lewd I Did Live (s02e16)

episode.name: Kapiushon
episode.summary: Prometheus goes to great lengths to break Oliver. Meanwhile, in the flashbacks, Anatoly becomes worried about Oliver’s increasingly violent tendencies, which come to a head in a brutal confrontation.

episode.name: Gimme Shelter
episode.summary: Clarke’s arrival on the island quickly takes a turn for the worse. Meanwhile, Bellamy tries to avoid further tragedy in Arkadia.

episode.name: The Weeping Somnambulist
episode.summary: Bobbie becomes a political pawn in the struggle between Earth and Mars.

episode.name: Evil Did I Dwell, Lewd I Did Live
episode.summary: With Nas's help, Weller and Jane finally come face-to-face with Nas's inside source within Sandstorm, and square off with an old foe.

item.title: Wed, 22 Mar
item.description:
Bones - The Day in the Life (s12e11)


The Americans (2013) - The Midges (s05e03)

episode.name: The Day in the Life
episode.summary: In the series' penultimate episode, each leading character's final story begins to unfold. Brennan testifies for Zach in trial, Angela reveals some big news, while Aubrey and Jessica come to terms about their future together. All the while, the team discovers Kovac has escaped, leaving Booth in a race against the clock to protect himself and those closest to him from what may be Kovac's most dangerous plan yet.

episode.name: The Midges
episode.summary: Philip and Elizabeth tell Paige more about the family business, but pressing new questions arise when an operation takes a ghastly and unexpected turn. A sensitive package jeopardizes Oleg’s life back in Russia.

item.title: Tue, 21 Mar
item.description:
Scorpion - Broken Wind (s03e20)


Quantico - LNWILT (s02e14)

episode.name: Broken Wind
episode.summary: While on a mission to repair a turbine at a wind farm, Team Scorpion must race to save Paige and Happy before the cable holding the gondola they are in snaps and sends them plummeting to the ground.

episode.name: LNWILT
episode.summary: In the wake of the G20 hostage crisis, President Claire Haas assembles an illegal and clandestine joint task force, bringing together Alex and her friends from both the FBI and CIA to unmask a global conspiracy.

item.title: Mon, 20 Mar
item.description:
The Walking Dead - The Other Side (s07e14)


Homeland - Sock Puppets (s06e09)


Black Sails - XXXVI (s04e08)


Billions - Currency (s02e05)


Into the Badlands - Tiger Pushes Mountain (s02e01)

episode.name: The Other Side
episode.summary: The Saviors visit the Hilltop unexpectedly, surprising everyone with plans of taking more than supplies.

episode.name: Sock Puppets
episode.summary: Carrie catches a break. Keane makes a plan. Max goes undercover.

episode.name: XXXVI
episode.summary: A rescue plan threatens to divide Flint and Silver. The true price of freedom becomes apparent to Max. Rackham seeks his prey. The Walrus enters uncharted territory.

episode.name: Currency
episode.summary: Chuck, Connerty and Sacker must rely on an anxious insider who's willing to wear a wire. Meanwhile, Axe's numbers take a big hit, leaving him to scout ideas for a quick play with a huge payoff. Wendy rediscovers her passion for her former job at Axe Capital through an old colleague. The reality of Lara's business starts to affect her marriage.

episode.name: Tiger Pushes Mountain
episode.summary: Six months after the Season 1 finale, Sunny finds a new foe, as well as a new, unexpected ally, while MK learns about his gift in a mysterious place.

item.title: Fri, 17 Mar
item.description: The Last Kingdom - Episode 1 (s02e01)

episode.name: Episode 1
episode.summary: Uhtred the fearless and instinctive warrior, begins his voyage north to avenge Earl Ragnar’s death and recapture his ancestral lands of Bebbanburg from his traitorous uncle, Aelfric. King Alfred’s conviction to unite the separate kingdoms of England is stronger than ever and he sets his sights on the wild lands of the north, which have fallen into the control of savage Dane brothers Sigefrid and Erik. Upon receiving word from Brother Trew and Father Beocca about a prophesised new king in the form of Christian Dane Guthred, Alfred sends the priests on a rescue mission, weighted in silver to free Guthred from the hands of slave traders. Elsewhere, Uhtred still feels the loss of Iseult and, fearful that they are straying from their journey north, Hild takes matters into her own hands to advance their quest. While crossing paths with Father Beocca in Eoferwic, Uhtred finds himself embroiled in a rescue mission and is brought face to face with an enemy of old. As the team enter into dangerous territory, will the exchange of ransom go to plan?

item.title: Thu, 16 Mar
item.description:
Modern Family - Pig Moon Rising (s08e17)


Arrow - Checkmate (s05e16)


The 100 - We Will Rise (s04e06)


The Expanse - Pyre (s02e08)

episode.name: Pig Moon Rising
episode.summary: Mitchell knocks over an urn filled with the ashes of Cameron's beloved pet pig Lilly while exercising in the garage, but Cameron suspects his cover-up is a load of hogwash.

episode.name: Checkmate
episode.summary: Oliver gets closer to the truth about Prometheus. Meanwhile, Helix refuses to continue helping Felicity until she does a favor for them.

episode.name: We Will Rise
episode.summary: Clarke and Roan must work together in hostile territory in order to deliver an invaluable asset to Abby and her team.

episode.name: Pyre
episode.summary: Naomi tracks down signs of the protomolecule; Fred Johnson's control over the OPA collapses.

item.title: Wed, 15 Mar
item.description:
Bones - The Radioactive Panthers in the Party (s12e10)


The Americans (2013) - Pests (s05e02)

episode.name: The Radioactive Panthers in the Party
episode.summary: When the burning, bruised body of an aspiring writer/director crash-lands onto a passing car, the team investigates a series of odd locations and characters that are connected to his film. Meanwhile, Bones seeks guidance from Dr. Mayer on the meaning of passion in the work place and Booth allows Aubrey to take the reins on their current case.

episode.name: Pests
episode.summary: Stan and Oleg wrestle with the harsh consequences of their complicated history. Philip and Elizabeth face a new mission with devastating implications for their country.

item.title: Tue, 14 Mar
item.description: Scorpion - Monkey See, Monkey Poo (s03e19)

episode.name: Monkey See, Monkey Poo
episode.summary: To stop a dangerous virus from spreading, Team Scorpion must locate a rare endangered monkey in the Amazon that has the antibody for the cure. Toby and Happy see a counselor to prepare for matrimony.

item.title: Mon, 13 Mar
item.description:
The Walking Dead - Bury Me Here (s07e13)


Homeland - Alt.Truth (s06e08)


Black Sails - XXXV (s04e07)


Billions - The Oath (s02e04)

episode.name: Bury Me Here
episode.summary: Things do not go as planned when a group of Kingdommers delivers goods to the Saviors during a routine supply drop-off.

episode.name: Alt.Truth
episode.summary: Carrie and Saul present evidence to Keane. Quinn tracks a mark.

episode.name: XXXV
episode.summary: Flint urges caution on an angry Silver. Max leads Rackham and Bonny up river. Billy locates a survivor. Rogers learns the truth.

episode.name: The Oath
episode.summary: Under pressure to make progress, Chuck develops a new strategy. Wendy helps a tech billionaire assess a candidate for a special project. Axe considers pledging half his net worth to charity. Lara's new business faces a rival. Meanwhile, Axe and Chuck find themselves together in a room for the first time since their face off.

item.title: Fri, 10 Mar
item.description:
The Big Bang Theory - The Escape Hatch Identification (s10e18)


Supernatural - Somewhere Between Heaven and Hell (s12e15)

episode.name: The Escape Hatch Identification
episode.summary: Raj searches for a cheaper living arrangement.

episode.name: Somewhere Between Heaven and Hell
episode.summary: An attack by an invisible hellhound at a campsite leads Sam and Dean to investigate the mysterious circumstances. Meanwhile, two of Crowley’s own personal demons uncover what he has been hiding. Castiel gets a lead on Kelly Kline.

item.title: Thu, 09 Mar
item.description:
Modern Family - Basketball (s08e16)


The Expanse - The Seventh Man (s02e07)

episode.name: Basketball
episode.summary: After choking at last year’s charity basketball game, Phil has been training all year to redeem himself. However, when NBA stars Charles Barkley and DeAndre Jordan attend the game and start making bets, Phil tries to not buckle under the pressure. Gloria has to step-up at Manny’s school when her nemesis, Donna Duncan, tries to shame her for her lack of support at the school. Claire does whatever it takes to keep a work mistake secret from Jay, while Jay’s concerned that Joe doesn’t have a healthy fear of him at all.

episode.name: The Seventh Man
episode.summary: Preparations for the Earth/Mars peace conference tighten the tension on Erringwright.

item.title: Wed, 08 Mar
item.description:
Bones - The Steel in the Wheels (s12e09)


The Americans (2013) - Amber Waves (s05e01)

episode.name: The Steel in the Wheels
episode.summary: When a young man dies in a horrendous hay baler accident, Booth, Brennan and Aubrey slap on trashy disguises and go undercover at a rowdy demolition derby competition to investigate the case. Meanwhile, Dr. Gordon Wyatt returns and assists Hodgins and Cam when the ongoing Gormogon case hits a dead end.

episode.name: Amber Waves
episode.summary: The fifth and penultimate season has the Jennings struggling to contain the risks from Paige's growing relationship with Matthew Beeman. The Centre sends Philip and Elizabeth on an operation unlike any they've ever had before, straining their family and marriage to its limits.

item.title: Mon, 06 Mar
item.description:
The Walking Dead - Say Yes (s07e12)


Homeland - Imminent Risk (s06e07)


Black Sails - XXXIV (s04e06)


Billions - Optimal Play (s02e03)

episode.name: Say Yes
episode.summary: The group scavenges for supplies. Back in Alexandria, someone must make a morally challenging decision.

episode.name: Imminent Risk
episode.summary: Carrie gets bad news. Saul makes a plan. Quinn accepts his situation.

episode.name: XXXIV
episode.summary: Nassau is delivered; Silver makes a painful amends; Madi and Flint are separated; Rogers searches for Eleanor.

episode.name: Optimal Play
episode.summary: Axe considers buying an NFL franchise, and finds a new ally. Chuck begins a last ditch case against a banking titan by developing a low-level informant. Meanwhile, Wendy makes a controversial appearance at the Alpha Cup Charity Poker Tournament by accompanying Axe's competitor as his performance coach. Lara launches her new business.

item.title: Fri, 03 Mar
item.description: Supernatural - The Raid (s12e14)

episode.name: The Raid
episode.summary: A chance to take out a nest of vampires backfires when the alpha-vamp shows up and turns the tables on Mary and The British Men of Letters, who are doing their best to recruit Sam and Dean.

item.title: Thu, 02 Mar
item.description:
Modern Family - Finding Fizbo (s08e15)


Suits - Character and Fitness (s06e16)


Arrow - Fighting Fire with Fire (s05e15)


The 100 - The Tinder Box (s04e05)


The Expanse - Paradigm Shift (s02e06)

episode.name: Finding Fizbo
episode.summary: Cam is enraged when he receives an online video showing someone has been desecrating his beloved Fizbo costume, which sets him on a quest to restore Fizbo’s good name. Phil is in for quite the surprise when he finally meets his new soon-to-be step-brother at Frank’s bachelor party. Manny’s newest play hits a little too close to home for Gloria, Claire, and Haley when he enlists them to do a read through before he submits it to a young playwright festival.

episode.name: Character and Fitness
episode.summary: Mike needs Harvey and Rachel's help to overcome an impossible obstacle, or his dream of becoming a real lawyer is over. Donna's new venture hits a snag. Louis tries to patch things up with Tara.

episode.name: Fighting Fire with Fire
episode.summary: Oliver faces his biggest challenge yet as mayor. Felicity continues down her dark path with Helix. After Vigilante attacks Oliver while he’s acting as the mayor, Diggle leads the team in a mission to stop Vigilante once and for all.

episode.name: The Tinder Box
episode.summary: Clarke makes a desperate plea with a former allied force in an attempt to avoid a war and ensure the survival of her people.

episode.name: Paradigm Shift
episode.summary: Earth and Mars search for answers in the aftermath of the asteroid collision.

item.title: Tue, 28 Feb
item.description: Scorpion - Don't Burst My Bubble (s03e18)

episode.name: Don't Burst My Bubble
episode.summary: Following a severe storm, Happy's friend Ada, who lives in a sterile bubble to protect her compromised immune system, is left with dangerous debris on the verge of puncturing the structure. Now, Team Scorpion works to safely move Ada to a more secure location without risking her life.
